wordGroup: coefficient of restitution 恢复系数；回弹系数

sentences.en: In an attempt to settle the case, Molken has agreed to pay restitution.
sentences.cn: 为了结此案，莫尔肯已同意赔偿。

sentences.en: The victims are demanding full restitution.
sentences.cn: 这些受害人要求全额赔偿。

sentences.en: When a defendant is sentenced to the D.O.C., the court must fix the amount of restitution on the mittimus.
sentences.cn: 当被告被判处宽限日期时，法院必须将赔偿额固定在收监令上。
